1.title: You Think You're Cool?

episode of.title: Face Forward: The BB Lifestyle Show (TV Series 2018– )

1.plot: Join Bill Bakho as he visits CryoHealthCare in West Hollywood California and discovers the secrets that happen to your body at -240 Degrees. Whole body cryotherapy is a modern take on the traditional ice bath and involves exposing the body to ultra-low temperatures ranging from -200°F and -256 °F.

2.title: Freeze Your Face

episode of.title: Face Forward: The BB Lifestyle Show (TV Series 2018– )

2.plot: Join Bill Bakho as he visits CryoHealthcare in West Hollywood and gets a frozen facial. Whole body cryotherapy is a modern take on the traditional ice bath and involves exposing the body to ultra-low temperatures ranging from -200°F and -256 °F.

3.title: Growth Isn't Always Painful

episode of.title: Face Forward: The BB Lifestyle Show (TV Series 2018– )

3.plot: Join Bill Bakho as he visits Mia LaMaven Luxury Spa and discovers the benefits of PRP for your hair. Mia La Maven is a full service luxury aesthetic medical spa. Services will include Laser Hair Removal, Tattoo Removal, Laser Skin Rejuvenation, Dermal Fillers and Botox, PRP (Platelet Rich Plasma), IV Therapy, Medical Facials and Hormone Replacement Therapy.

4.title: Forever Young

episode of.title: Face Forward: The BB Lifestyle Show (TV Series 2018– )

4.plot: Join Bill Bakho as he visits Mia Maven Luxury Spa and discovers the benefits of a PRP Facial. Mia La Maven is a full service luxury aesthetic medical spa. Services will include Laser Hair Removal, Tattoo Removal, Laser Skin Rejuvenation, Dermal Fillers and Botox, PRP (Platelet Rich Plasma), IV Therapy, Medical Facials and Hormone Replacement Therapy.

5.title: Assessing Deficiencies

episode of.title: Face Forward: The BB Lifestyle Show (TV Series 2018– )

5.plot: Join Bill Bakho as he visits Optimal Performance and Recovery and learns the secrets behind assessing health deficiencies using natural non invasive methods. Understanding functional movement patterns is the critical factor in recovering from sport-related injuries. OPR is the #1 choice in Seal Beach for recreational, professional and extreme athletes who have to perform at their best.

8.title: Getting MAD Atcha

episode of.title: Face Forward: The BB Lifestyle Show (TV Series 2018– )

8.plot: Bill goes under the hood of Mangum Automotive Designs led by Chris Mangum. This Costa Mesa company has built numerous show automobiles, trucks, bikes and boat builds in the last 12 years for top manufactures along with key automotive accessory companies for marketing and display. With many Magazine Covers, Features and Manufacture Design awards, his peers come to Chris for his expertise. Mangum Automotive Designs has the ability to turn design rendering and specifications either by Mangum or OEM into detailed completed platforms that Manufactures can count on time and...

9.title: Putting Pals at Pelican Hill

episode of.title: Face Forward: The BB Lifestyle Show (TV Series 2018– )

9.plot: Can Bill take his game to the next level with the help of Glenn Deck, a Golf Magazine "Top 100 Teacher," and his expert team of PGA Professionals? Designed to help all ages and skill sets, the Golf Academy instructs each golfer according to their own individual needs and attributes, improving their golf swing while also strengthening their mental focus and approach. But what if Bill has never Golfed before? This can only end one way...

11.title: BROKEN BOARDS OR BONES - TAEKWON-DO

episode of.title: Face Forward: The BB Lifestyle Show (TV Series 2018– )

11.plot: Will Bill be able to keep up with Master Paul D'Ambrosio at the Aliso Hills Taekwon do center? Will the day end with a trip to the hospital, or victory in mastering the arts - and intention?

12.title: WHAT'S YOUR VISION?

episode of.title: Face Forward: The BB Lifestyle Show (TV Series 2018– )

12.plot: Bill makes a visit to AG Vision in Laguna Beach California to meet and talk to the founder Adriana Guzman. From her roots in Guadalajara to establishing an interior design business and retail store, Adriana Guzman has pursued a vision of sharing her view of true Mexican heritage with others. The Laguna Beach AG VISION retail store provides a great forum for both local and visiting customers to experience her presentation of authentic designs and craftsmanship from Mexico. All AG Vision products are either designed and made in Mexico or developed by Ms. Guzman. ...

13.title: PARTIDA MY TEQUILA!

episode of.title: Face Forward: The BB Lifestyle Show (TV Series 2018– )

13.plot: Join Bill as he meets Sophia Partida and searches for the answer to the question, "What is Partida Tequila's story?" You'll also find the answers to what are the essential facts about making tequila, and the best ways to enjoy Partida Tequila in this adventure that might leave you buzzing.

imdb.plot outline: Join us on an informative and dynamic journey as we follow Founder and President of BB Lifestyle, Bill Bakho. We get a peek inside Bill's life, while he tries out the latest in skincare and luxury treatments, innovative health and wellness practices along with new technology.
imdb.title: Face Forward: The BB Lifestyle Show
